text: 11|18|Yisakale allaha samparke micha ratana karae, sihamtatakai danara yalima arau kona ha’ba parae? Sihamtaka sihamtara pratipalakara sanmukhata upasthita karaoraa ha’ba arau saksisakale ka’ba, ‘ihamte nija pratipalakara bisaye micha kaichila’. Saradhana! Yalimasakalara oparata allahara abhisapa.
